tags: sansa gets all the handsome princes
summary: Hi just seen your Thor post do you know of any other sansa/hero fics/edits like Thor/sansa
question: Hi just seen your Thor post do you know of any other sansa/hero fics/edits like Thor/sansa
answer:
There are a few that I’ve read before that I searched up… it’s not as common as shipping Sansa with a prince or a king (I’m including some of those too because I found them and want to share them! XD)

This is my tag for thorsa and this is my tag for Sansa x Princes

For Sansa/hero, I have some Sansa/Steve Rogers here by wickedg and here by secondstarontheleft and here by @vixleonard

There is also Sansa/Loki here by MissChrisDaae and here by secondstarontheleft

For Sansa/princes, there’s a bit of Sansa/King Arthur here and here by @madamebaggio , here by wickedg, and here by secondstarontheleft

There is also Sansa/Peter here by @madamebaggio and here by @thatgirlnevershutsup and Sansa/Edmund here by halotolerant 

For Tolkien, there is Curufin/Sansa here by amethysttribble, Sansa/Maedhros here by grundy and a here by @alia-andreth, Boromir/Sansa here and here by @zip00198704 as well as Eomer/Sansa here, and Sansa/Fili here by @thatgirlnevershutsup

Hope that helps you find something you like!

summary: “For her lady mother’s sake. And for yours.”
title: “For her lady mother’s sake. And for yours.”
body:
In case anyone’s wondering if I think Brienne’s romance with Jaime will take precedence over her protection assignment with Sansa, my answer is: you know they’re not mutually exclusive, yes? Jaime is the one who gave her the protection assignment. Jaime is the one who gave her that super-fancy, Lannister-branded sword (any cheap-ass basic sword would’ve worked just fine) for the task. And her loyalty to Jaime is much of what’s keeping Brienne going through AFFC. Brienne and Jaime BOTH want Sansa Stark to be safe and healthy. Hence his deserting his army in ADWD. 

There’s no reason why Brienne can’t rescue Sansa from Littlefucker’s control and also have a romantic outcome with Jaime. The protection assignment is useful—socially, emotionally and politically—in the short-to-medium term. It doesn’t need to take the rest of her life. 

(Yeah, I know, I need to get back to writing Project Oathkeeper.)

There’s no reason why Brienne can’t rescue Sansa from Littlefucker’s control and also have a romantic outcome with Jaime. The protection assignment is useful—socially, emotionally and politically—in the short-to-medium term. It doesn’t need to take the rest of her life.

And her loyalty to Jaime is much of what’s keeping Brienne going through AFFC. Brienne and Jaime BOTH want Sansa Stark to be safe and healthy. Hence his deserting his army in ADWD. 

There’s no reason why Brienne can’t rescue Sansa from Littlefucker’s control and also have a romantic outcome with Jaime. The protection assignment is useful—socially, emotionally and politically—in the short-to-medium term. It doesn’t need to take the rest of her life. 

(Yeah, I know, I need to get back to writing Project Oathkeeper.)
trail.content:
In case anyone’s wondering if I think Brienne’s romance with Jaime will take precedence over her protection assignment with Sansa, my answer is: you know they’re not mutually exclusive, yes? Jaime is the one who gave her the protection assignment. Jaime is the one who gave her that super-fancy, Lannister-branded sword (any cheap-ass basic sword would’ve worked just fine) for the task. And her loyalty to Jaime is much of what’s keeping Brienne going through AFFC. Brienne and Jaime BOTH want Sansa Stark to be safe and healthy. Hence his deserting his army in ADWD. 

There’s no reason why Brienne can’t rescue Sansa from Littlefucker’s control and also have a romantic outcome with Jaime. The protection assignment is useful—socially, emotionally and politically—in the short-to-medium term. It doesn’t need to take the rest of her life.

summary: Chapters: 1/1 Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV) Rating: General Audiences Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply Relationships: Jon...
caption:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Jon Snow/Sansa Stark
Characters: Jon Snow, Jon Snow | Aegon Targaryen, Sansa Stark
Additional Tags: Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Angst and Hurt/Comfort, Jon Needs a Hug, POV Sansa Stark
Series: Part 2 of Glimpses

Summary:

“This can’t be happening…” Jon mumbles. He sounds lost and disappointed. Sansa puts a hand on his arm. Jon is shivering. This must to feel like a nightmare for him. “I don’t want to be…” He can’t finish the sentence because the moment he says it, it will be real. And Jon doesn’t want to make it real.

Read
